Text:
Thanks for uploading but:

This is not
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0161849/
Natura contro aka Cannibal Holocaust II
it is this
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0091902/
Schiave bianche: violenza in Amazzonia aka White Slave aka Cannibal Holocaust 2 The Catherine Miles Story

quote:

"This is the first of two movies that adopted the alternate title of Cannibal Holocaust 2, in hopes of boosting the movie's popularity by associating it with the more notorious Cannibal Holocaust."


well i'm glad its the wrong one, since this is the only available copy of White Slave (1985)

so thanks heaps!
